content.rendered:
Family all arrived for the wedding of Chris and Charlotte. It was a small wedding in a small chapel on the north side of town. It was a beautiful wedding, and even Caff (short for Caffeine) attended.

The two moved into Chris’ home. Ten months later, Julia was born, weighing in at 6 pounds, nine ounces. And two years after that, Daniel was born, weighing it at 6 pounds, eight ounces. Then there were four.

Chris continued teaching, but put his crime fighting on hold, until… One evening, on his way home from the work, Chris noticed a man standing outside the bank. He looked suspicious, so Chris watched and waited.

Chris started with a song, humming at first, gradually getting louder, Before he knew it, the man was asleep. Just then, two men rushed out of the bank, finding their friend, sound asleep. It seemed that the man who was supposed to drive the get away car was sound asleep.

Chris continued his song and, soon, all three men were sound asleep. Soon, the police were on the scene, and all three men were taken into custody. But the question remained, who had stopped these men? Who was this hero who saved the day. Only we know the truth. Yes, it was Nap Man.

(to be continued)
